tasks.label: Build Camera Test (MSVC)
args: if not exist build mkdir build && cl src\test_camera_windows.cpp /Fo:build\test_camera_windows.obj /I C:\opencv\build\include /Fe:build\test_camera_msvc.exe /link /LIBPATH:C:\opencv\build\x64\vc16\lib opencv_world4120.lib

tasks.label: Build Camera Test (g++)
args: mkdir -p build && g++ src/test_camera_windows.cpp -o build/test_camera_gpp -std=c++11 `pkg-config --cflags --libs opencv4`
